name: Game Changer Pt. 2 (GDKO RD 2)
description:
Entry to GDKO Round 2. It is not a full game, just a new toy you get to play with, and of course your ability from before...

CONTROLS:

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse (or arrow keys) to look around
  • Space to interact
  • P to use your power

If the keyboard doesn't work, try clicking inside the game window. In rare cases you may need to refresh the page.

CREDITS: The ground texture is public domain (CC0) from opengameart.org. Music is from Pixabay, "Time" by ASHUTOSH-MUSIC. Sound effects are from mixkit.co.

STORY: The ability and character (you!) carry over from round 1. Personally, this is a power I really wish I'd had when playing in the schoolyard. The story of round 1 is not continued in this round, but may return in the future! In this round, your enemy is Joey... ;)
